scenes.description: Pavolia Reine and Kureiji Ollie talk about their duet name 'RENYA' and transition to the next performance.
Song performance of 'Ah, Subarashiki Nyansei' (嗚呼、素晴らしきニャン生).
Post-performance talk where they joke about being house cats versus wild cats.

subtitles.original: Yeay!
subtitles.english: Yeay!

subtitles.original: Tapi gitu nih, ini tuh bukan semua, ini masih ada lagi sebenarnya ya.
subtitles.english: But wait, this isn't all, there's actually more to come.

subtitles.original: Iya masih ada lagi guys. Jadi tonton sampai akhir!
subtitles.english: Yeah, there's more, guys. So watch until the end!

subtitles.original: Yeay!
subtitles.english: Yeay!

subtitles.original: Eh bentar bentar bentar, sebelum itu aku mau mutusin nama duet kita dong.
subtitles.english: Wait, wait, wait, before that, I want to decide our duet name.

subtitles.original: Apa? Oh iya!
subtitles.english: What? Oh yeah!

subtitles.original: Oh iya kita belum ada nama kombo gitu kan ya?
subtitles.english: Oh yeah, we don't have a combo name yet, right?

subtitles.original: RENYA gimana? Kayaknya lucu banget.
subtitles.english: How about RENYA? It seems really cute.

subtitles.original: RENYA? RENYA lucu banget! Aku suka.
subtitles.english: RENYA? RENYA is really cute! I like it.

subtitles.original: Kalau gitu mulai sekarang nama duetnya Reine dan Anya adalah RENYA!
subtitles.english: In that case, from now on the duet name for Reine and Anya is RENYA!

subtitles.original: Kalo gitu kita ulang lagi, masih ada lagu selanjutnya!
subtitles.english: Then let's do it again, there's still the next song!

subtitles.original: Masih ada lagu selanjutnya, guys!
subtitles.english: There's still the next song, guys!

subtitles.original: Jadi tonton sampai akhir! Tonton sampai akhir, oke?
subtitles.english: So watch until the end! Watch until the end, okay?

subtitles.original: Dan mari kita pergi ke lagu...
subtitles.english: And let's go to the...

subtitles.original: ...selanjutnya!
subtitles.english: ...next song!

subtitles.original: 嗚呼、素晴らしきニャン生
subtitles.english: Ah, Subarashiki Nyansei

subtitles.original: Lyrics・Composition: Nem
subtitles.english: Lyrics・Composition: Nem

subtitles.original: これは可愛いお嬢さん
subtitles.english: Hey there, cute little miss,

subtitles.original: 真っ白な毛がとても素敵ね
subtitles.english: Your pure white fur is so lovely.

subtitles.original: こんな月が綺麗な夜は
subtitles.english: On a night with a moon as beautiful as this,

subtitles.original: 僕と一緒に遊びませんか
subtitles.english: Won't you come out and play with me?

subtitles.original: ニャン生は一度きり
subtitles.english: A cat's life is only once,

subtitles.original: 楽しむが勝ちなのです
subtitles.english: So having fun is how you win.

subtitles.original: あなたを縛る首輪
subtitles.english: That collar that binds you...

subtitles.original: 噛みちぎってあげましょう
subtitles.english: I'll bite it right off for you.

subtitles.original: 野良は最高ニャニャニャ
subtitles.english: Being a stray is the best, nya nya nya!

subtitles.original: 魚盗んで、鳩追いかけて
subtitles.english: Stealing fish, chasing pigeons,

subtitles.original: 昼は働く人間を
subtitles.english: In the daytime, I watch humans working

subtitles.original: 尻目に屋根の上でフンス
subtitles.english: Out of the corner of my eye, napping on the roof.

subtitles.original: あなたも自由にニャニャニャ
subtitles.english: You can be free too, nya nya nya!

subtitles.original: 素敵な仲間も紹介しましょう
subtitles.english: I'll introduce you to some wonderful friends.

subtitles.original: さっさの窓を開いて
subtitles.english: Open up that window quickly

subtitles.original: 飛び出すのです
subtitles.english: And leap out!

subtitles.original: これは気ままな野良猫さん
subtitles.english: Hey there, carefree Mr. Stray,

subtitles.original: 闇の中目だけが光ってる
subtitles.english: Only your eyes are shining in the dark.

subtitles.original: 随分口が上手だけど
subtitles.english: You're quite a smooth talker,

subtitles.original: 私は馬鹿な女じゃないわ
subtitles.english: But I'm not a foolish girl.

subtitles.original: ニャン生は一度きり
subtitles.english: A cat's life is only once,

subtitles.original: だからこそ飼われるのよ
subtitles.english: And that's exactly why I'm kept.

subtitles.original: ブランド首輪の価値が
subtitles.english: The value of this brand-name collar...

subtitles.original: あなたには分かるかしら？
subtitles.english: Could you possibly understand it?

subtitles.original: 私は優雅よニャニャニャ
subtitles.english: I'm elegant, nya nya nya!

subtitles.original: 美味しい食事にふかふかベッド
subtitles.english: Delicious meals and a fluffy bed.

subtitles.original: 水はちょっぴり苦手だけど
subtitles.english: I'm a little bit afraid of water,

subtitles.original: 毎日シャワーで洗えるの
subtitles.english: But I can wash in the shower every day.

subtitles.original: それに比べてニャニャニャ
subtitles.english: Compared to that, nya nya nya,

subtitles.original: 身体を誰に守ってもらうの？
subtitles.english: Who's there to protect you?

subtitles.original: 明日車に轢かれちゃうかも
subtitles.english: Tomorrow you might get hit by a car,

subtitles.original: 知れないじゃない
subtitles.english: You never know.

subtitles.original: そんな強がりもニャニャニャ
subtitles.english: Even that show of strength, nya nya nya,

subtitles.original: とっても素敵です
subtitles.english: Is very wonderful.

subtitles.original: いっそあなたを
subtitles.english: I've actually gone and...

subtitles.original: 好きになりました
subtitles.english: ...fallen for you.

subtitles.original: あら正直ねだけど
subtitles.english: Oh, how honest. However,

subtitles.original: そんなに簡単じゃ
subtitles.english: it's not quite that simple,

subtitles.original: 心揺らがないわ
subtitles.english: my heart won't be swayed.

subtitles.original: 僕の夢はニャニャニャ
subtitles.english: My dream is, nya nya nya,

subtitles.original: いつかは黒い街を飛び出して
subtitles.english: to one day leap out of this dark city,

subtitles.original: はるか北の国に旅して
subtitles.english: travel to a far-off northern country,

subtitles.original: オーロラをこの目で見ることです
subtitles.english: and see the aurora with my own eyes.

subtitles.original: そこにあなたがニャニャニャ
subtitles.english: If you were there with me, nya nya nya,

subtitles.original: いてくれたらなんて素敵でしょう
subtitles.english: how wonderful would that be?

subtitles.original: だけどそれは叶わないらしい
subtitles.english: But it seems that won't come true.

subtitles.original: 生き方はニャニャニャ
subtitles.english: A way of life, nya nya nya,

subtitles.original: そう簡単には変えられないの
subtitles.english: can't be changed so easily.

subtitles.original: それに私を飼っている
subtitles.english: Besides, I can't leave

subtitles.original: 女の子を一人にできないわ
subtitles.english: the girl who keeps me all alone.

subtitles.original: 話の途中よニャニャニャ
subtitles.english: I'm still talking, nya nya nya!

subtitles.original: あらもう行っちゃうのねちょっと
subtitles.english: Oh, you're leaving already? Hey!

subtitles.original: 明日もここに来ていいのよ
subtitles.english: You can come here tomorrow too, you know.

subtitles.original: 待ってるからね
subtitles.english: I'll be waiting.

subtitles.original: ニャー！
subtitles.english: Nyaa!

subtitles.original: ニャニャニャニャニャ...
subtitles.english: Nya nya nya nya nya...

subtitles.original: Kucing garong!
subtitles.english: Garong cat!

subtitles.original: Kucing garong? Aku kucing rumahan.
subtitles.english: Garong cat? I'm a house cat.

subtitles.original: Aku kucing garong!
subtitles.english: I'm a garong cat!

subtitles.original: Yang barusan adalah Ah, Subarashiki ニャン生！
subtitles.english: That was 'Ah, Subarashiki Nyansei'!

subtitles.original: Yeay!
subtitles.english: Yeay!
